General.Name: Dewata Freight International Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Dewata Freightinternational Tbk provides freight forwarding, vehicle rental, distribution management, and construction services. It engages in trade and mining services. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia. PT Dewata Freightinternational Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Bimada Paramita Adhyana.
General.Address: Kirana Two Office Tower, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14240

1.Name: Ms. Nur  Hasanah
